Text:
[08-09-03] Wiikey update 1.9b

A leaked version of the wiikey firmware update is available on several websites. While the leaked firmware is indeed working and has all of the announced features, it has not yet been fully tested and does not come with the configuration and recovery discs. A full version will be available from wiikey.cn very soon.
So am I to understand that once the Wiikey team releases an update, there will be no more region conflicts?

yes but does this work
it has had many dl and no comment on if it bricks
It works fine on my wii pal with wiikey firmware 3.0E
I use wiikey and have a north american wii, but using the us update it cant read the disc, would the PAL one work? id just check myself but i hate wasting DVDs
